metadata.title: CVE-2024-45802 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Squid is an open source caching proxy for the Web supporting HTTP, HTTPS,FTP, and more. Due to Input Validation, Premature Release of ResourceDuring Expected Lifetime, and Missing Release of Resource after EffectiveLifetime bugs, Squid is vulnerable to Denial of Service attacks by atrusted server against all clients using the proxy. This bug is fixed inthe default build configuration of Squid version 6.10.

criterions.comment: squid package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
